Entries.structureBuilt_Fish Pond: I mentioned to Willy that you got a new fish pond. He seemed really happy about it.#$e#Apparently, he raised crabs when he was a young man. Called it a 'time-honoured tradition'.$h
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's film, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Centre... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelt really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
